entry.dcterms:title: Purposes and Labor Market Strategies of Unemployed People in Fejér County 2001
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-F02: Purposes and Labor Market Strategies of Unemployed People in Fejér County 2001. data sheet. Version: 2007-01-19
entry.dcterms:creator: Tóth, István János
entry.dcterms:description: labor demand and supply, the aims and strategies of labor market participants, demand for foreign labor force, aspirations of the unemployed
entry.dcterms:subject: business/industrial management and organisation
labour and employment
person
qualitative and quantitavie
cross-section

Interviews with the mangers of employment branch of the Labor Center of Fejér county, and the managers and HR managers of the big employer companies in the area, and in addition a small-sample empirical research in two pre-selected districts of Fejér county among registered unemployed people.
face-to-face interview
D (after 2010-01-01: A)
